author: Paul Rankin
method: For the onion bhajis, combine all the onion bhaji ingredients, except the vegetable oil, in a mixing bowl.  Heat the vegetable oil in a deep heavy-based pan until a breadcrumb sizzles and turns brown when dropped into it. (CAUTION: Hot oil can be dangerous. Do not leave unattended.) Deep fry tablespoonfuls of the onion mixture until golden-brown, then remove from the pan with a slotted spoon and set aside to drain on kitchen paper. For the salsa, combine all the salsa ingredients in a bowl. To serve, put the bhajis onto a plate and serve with the salsa.
ingredients: ½ onion, peeled, sliced,  1 tsp black onion seeds,  ½ tsp turmeric,  2 tbsp chapatti flour,  vegetable oil, for deep frying,  ½ small mango, peeled, stone removed, chopped,  1 ripe tomato, chopped,  1 tsp caster sugar,  2 tbsp chopped fresh coriander leaves,  ½ lime, juice only,  ½ small onion, peeled, finely chopped
